title: Teen Mom OG star Amber Portwood reaches plea deal in domestic battery arrest
text:
She was arrested in July on domestic violence charges against now ex Andrew Glennon.

And Amber Portwood has reached a plea deal in her arrest and will not serve time in prison, according to E! News.

The Teen Mom reality star, 29, is set to receive one felony charge for the incident and be on probation for one year, the outlet reported.

Decision: Amber Portwood has reached a plea deal in her arrest and will not serve time in prison, according to E! News

If she successfully completes her one year of probation, her felony charge will be reduced to a misdemeanor.

According to Us Weekly, she is 'relieved but overall, she's just really focused on' her son James.

The alleged incident occurred on July 5 just around 2 am in Indianapolis; according to dispatch audio, her then-boyfriend Andrew, 35, believed their one-year-old son's life was in danger.

TMZ obtained documents that revealed Glennon is seeking custody of their son James.

Moving forward: The Teen Mom reality star, 29, is set to receive one felony charge for the incident and be on probation for one year, the outlet reported; pictured with Andrew at the 2017 MTV Video Music Awards at The Forum in Inglewood

Future: If she successfully completes her one year of probation, her felony charge will be reduced to a misdemeanor

The documents also claimed that Amber got in a heated argument with Glennon, and grabbed a machete and struck the door which Glennon was on the other side of.

While the machete didn't strike Glennon, Amber reportedly struck him with a shoe while he was holding their son.

She denied his claims during a sit-down interview with Dr, Drew Pinsky, which aired during a September Teen Mom OG reunion special, calling his allegations 'insane.'

Amber had said: 'I opted out of drug court a long time ago to put myself in prison to help myself. You haven't hear s**t from me since then. I haven't got in trouble one time. But all of a sudden, I'm running after my kid and [Andrew] with a machete? You're insane.'

Drama: She denied his claims during a sit-down interview with Dr, Drew Pinsky, which aired during a September Teen Mom OG reunion special, calling his allegations 'insane'

After her arrest on three felony counts, including domestic battery and criminal recklessness with a deadly weapon, a judge granted Glennon a temporary restraining order against her.

In August, the reality star was granted additional visits with their child by a judge, according to Us Weekly.

Amber has another child, 10 year old Leah, with Gary Shirley, who both starred on the original season of Teen Mom in 2009.
